00060 #define snew2(ptr,nelem) (ptr)=(rvec*)save_calloc(#ptr,__FILE__,__LINE__,\
00061                         (nelem),sizeof(*(ptr)))

00064 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00065 
00066 bool PDBTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string file, Topology &top)
00067 {
00068     char title[512];
00069     rvec *x, *v;
00070     ::matrix box;
00071     int ePBC;
00072     t_atoms atoms;
00073     set_program_name("VOTCA");
00074 
00075     //snew(atoms,1);
00076     get_stx_coordnum((char*)file.c_str(),&(atoms.nr));
00077     init_t_atoms(&atoms,atoms.nr,TRUE);
00078     snew2(x,atoms.nr);
00079     snew2(v,atoms.nr);
00080     fprintf(stderr,"\nReading structure file\n");
00081 
00082     read_stx_conf((char*)file.c_str(), title,&atoms,
00083                           x,NULL,&ePBC,box);
00084     Residue *res = top.CreateResidue("no");
00085     // read the atoms
00086     for(int i=0; i < atoms.nr; i++) {
00087         t_atom *a;
00088         a = &(atoms.atom[i]);
00089         BeadType *type = top.GetOrCreateBeadType("no");
00090         top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms.atomname[i]), type, res->getId(), a->m, a->q);  
00091         //cout << *(gtp.atoms.atomname[i]) << " residue: " << a->resnr << endl;
00092     }
00093    
00094     return true;
00095 }
